about_the_game:
Story


With severely distressful situations and emotional accumulation, in the end, all the feelings and subconscious thoughts break out into the world. They reshape existence and unite the nightmare with reality.

A simple artist, unable to find his place in life, is disappointed in himself. Uncertainty, the constant series of failures, and the inability to keep on brought him to a nervous breakdown. Now there is a spiraling zone of personal horror has formed. The world has looped around the artist and you alone can help him escape from the never-ending dream and return to reality. Or fail and only let him submerge deeper into self-hatred.

Feature



You have little time to successfully escape the nightmare. You will not be able to explore everything so choose wisely where to go and what to do.


Through a series of correct decisions you can put an end to the psychological hell of the lost person. Some characters will give you the right ideas but will you come to the right conclusion?


Listen carefully to the interlocutors and decide who's worth trusting and who isn't. In the world of lies and anxieties it's hard to determine the right path.


The lantern will help you find mysteries and what's hidden from the naked eye. But use it carefully: some hate light.


Run away, hide and use the lantern to get away from danger. Always be on your guard: every inhabitant of the city has their own tendencies and only by observing them will make you understand how to avoid the enemy.
